short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download create and share your own CSS modifications that run on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATED: now you can share your CSS mods with the community!

Want to change the look of a particular site? Or maybe you want to add/remove some styling across all sites? This extension will let you do that.

How it works:
- Write your CSS.
- Set your URL matches. This is where you want the CSS to be included.
- That's it!
